headline: How MPLX's 12.5% Distribution Hike and 7.71% Yield Has Changed Its Investment Story (MPLX)
summary: MPLX LP recently raised its quarterly distribution by 12.5%, lifting its forward yield to 7.71% and reinforcing its long-term commitment to returning cash to unitholders through contracted, fee-based midstream operations anchored by Marathon Petroleum. This move, supported by a payout ratio below 60%, long-dated volume commitments into the 2030s, and ongoing investment in natural gas and crude logistics, underscores how MPLX is using disciplined capital allocation and buybacks to grow...
